sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: lac operator
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: The lac repressor binds to the lac operator to inhibit transcription in E. coli. This inhibition can be relieved by adding lactose or isopropyl-beta-D-thiogalactopyranoside (IPTG).

Lamaa A, Le Bras M, Skuli N, Britton S, Frit P, Calsou P, Prats H, Cammas A, Millevoi S. EMBO Rep. 2016 Apr;17(4):508-18. doi: 10.15252/embr.201541181. sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:description: Plasmid for constitutive or doxy-inducible expression of mutant human Ku70 unable to bind DNA and resistant to siRNA. Confers resistance to puro. Use T-REx cells for doxycycline-inducible expression..

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: Puro-R
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Puromycin resistance gene, reverse primer. Also called puro-variant-R
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: Puro-R
f1 ori
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: f1 ori
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: f1 bacteriophage origin of replication; arrow indicates direction of (+) strand synthesis

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:purpose: Plasmid for constitutive or doxy-inducible expression of mutant human Ku70 unable to bind DNA and resistant to siRNA. Confers resistance to puro. Use T-REx cells for doxycycline-inducible expression.
